meanings.definition: The act of going up or ascending, especially to Israel.
meanings.sent1: During the Aliya, many people moved to Israel for a better life.
meanings.sent2: My grandparents made Aliya to Israel many years ago.
meanings.sent3: The Aliya to the top of the hill was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: Her Aliya to success was marked by hard work and determination.
meanings.sent5: The Aliya up the stairs was tiring but rewarding.

meanings.sent1: The Aliya from Russia settled in a new community in Israel.
meanings.sent2: She became an Aliya after moving to Israel from Europe.
meanings.sent3: The Aliya brought delicious traditional food to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: His Aliya story is one of hope and new beginnings.
meanings.sent5: The Aliya's journey to Israel was filled with anticipation and excitement.

meanings.sent1: The Aliya to the mountain peak offered breathtaking views.
meanings.sent2: The hiker's Aliya to the summit was challenging but worth it.
meanings.sent3: The cat's Aliya to the top of the tree caused quite a commotion.
meanings.sent4: His Aliya to leadership was met with admiration and respect.
meanings.sent5: The Aliya to the rooftop provided a stunning panorama of the city.
